revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Radxa |model=Rock Pi |revision=S (D4PN8) V12 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=Currently Shipping |price=22 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Type-C |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3308 |cpu1_cspeed=1.3 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=1 GiB |fla1_brand=Maker Founder |fla1_model=MKDV8G1L-AS |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ4G63EFR-RDC |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 26-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (150000 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201F |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy Corp;SY8089;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy Corp;SY8088;;3;,,, High-PSRR 500mA LDO;Powtech;PT5108;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, I2S, I2C, SPI, GPIO, PoE Expansion header, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2017.09; |stock_os=Linux;4.4.153-55;Debian 10; |tp_firmware=Armbian, Slackware, |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=rock |default_pass=rock |oui_eth=8E:D6:16 }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://wiki.radxa.com/RockpiS Product page]
The [https://wiki.radxa.com/ROCKPI_S_PoE_HAT RockPi S PoE HAT] (or a similar product) is required for PoE support. {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
*[http://linuxgizmos.com/radxa-updates-rock-pi-4-with-nvme-and-debuts-poe-hat-and-a-tiny-rk3308-based-voice-board/ ''Radxa a tiny RK3308-based voice board'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://liliputing.com/2019/10/rock-pi-s-is-a-1-7-inch-square-quad-core-computer-priced-at-10-and-up.html ''Rock Pi S is a 1.7 inch square, quad-core computer'' on '''Liliputing'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/06/19/rock-pi-s-tiny-sbc-rockchip-rk3308-processor/ ''ROCK Pi S is a tiny SBC powered by Rockchip RK3308'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3308 @1.3GHz :Quad-core (ARM Cortex-A35) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Onboard Storage: 1GiB (SD NAND) flash, :TF card (max. 128GB)/MMC card slot *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet w/ opt. PoE *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port *GPIO: 2x 26-pin headers *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Type-C
